backend/main.mo: Defines story, user profile, comment, and report types plus sorting and distance utilities, with storage mixins for blob handling.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries linking features to affected frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated summaries of multiple frontend files describing their roles, behaviors, and key UI or logic features.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS base layers and theme variables for light and dark modes with custom color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the React app with geolocation permissions policy and script loader.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication, view routing, interactivity guards, and rendering of main pages.
frontend/src/components/CreateStoryDialo: Dialog for creating stories with fields, image upload, draft handling, location picking, and permission-aware logic.
frontend/src/components/CreateStoryFAB.t: Floating action button component that triggers story creation via a large gradient-styled button.
frontend/src/components/DistanceKmSlider: Simple range slider component for selecting distance in kilometers with optional helper text and inactive mode.
frontend/src/components/FilterBar.tsx: Renders category filter buttons and calls a callback when the selected category changes.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Displays a simple footer with branding and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Provides the main app header with navigation, authentication handling, theme toggle, and user/admin menu.
frontend/src/components/local-updates/Cr: A dialog for creating a new local update with text, category, radius, and optional image upload. Validates input, processes images, handles location constraints, and submits updates via mutation.
frontend/src/components/local-updates/Lo: Displays details of a local update including image, metadata, relevance, and view counts, with actions for deleting and thumbs-up. Auto-increments view count on open and respects admin/author permissions.
Lets users toggle notification muting per local update category via switches. Uses stored muted-category state and presents each category with icon feedback.
A floating action button that triggers creating a new local update. Styled prominently with a plus icon for quick access.
Renders a scrollable list of local updates with relevance highlighting, media, metadata, and thumbs‑up interactions.
Displays local updates on an interactive Leaflet map with category-colored markers and selection handling.
frontend/src/components/LocationPickerDi: Dialog for selecting a location with geolocation support and map interaction, returning the chosen coordinates.
frontend/src/components/MapView.tsx: Leaflet-based map component that displays stories, handles clustering, searching, markers, and click interactions.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting new users to enter a username and saves the profile to the backend.
frontend/src/components/SortControl.tsx: Dropdown control that lets users choose how stories are sorted, with optional nearest-location disabling.
frontend/src/components/StoryCard.tsx: Card displaying a story preview with like, pin, view, and share actions, using user profile and location data.
frontend/src/components/StoryDetailDialo: Displays a detailed modal view of a story with actions like liking, commenting, reporting, editing, and deleting, including image handling and admin controls. Manages extensive local state and triggers queries/mutations for interactions.
frontend/src/components/StoryFeed.tsx: Shows a grid of StoryCard components or skeletons while loading. Handles empty states with location-aware messaging and triggers a callback when a story is clicked.
frontend/src/components/WallpaperSetting: Provides a dialog for selecting, previewing, applying, or removing a wallpaper image with validation and toast feedback. Manages file input, preview lifecycle, and wallpaper persistence via a custom hook.
frontend/src/env.d.ts: Defines Vite environment variable typings for frontend builds.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Manages creation and lifecycle of a backend actor tied to the user's identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useDrafts.ts: Provides hooks to list, fetch, create, and update user story drafts using the backend actor with React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useForegroundLocation: Tracks foreground geolocation with watchPosition and polling fallback, exposing location, errors, and manual refresh.
frontend/src/hooks/useGeolocationPermiss: Handles geolocation permission state, diagnostics, and safe location requests with automatic rechecks.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, loading stored identities, and handling login states via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useLeafletMapResize.t: Hook that forces Leaflet maps to recalc size when they become visible or after container animations.
Manages user-muted local update categories with localStorage persistence and provides mute toggling helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalUpdateNotific: Detects relevant nearby local updates and triggers system or in‑app notifications while avoiding duplicates.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalUpdates.ts: Provides React Query hooks for creating and fetching local updates through the backend actor, with automatic cache invalidation and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for user profiles, stories, admin checks, and other backend interactions using an authenticated actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useReverseGeocodedPla: Fetches a human‑readable place name from coordinates with loading and error tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useWallpaper.ts: Manages a user-selected wallpaper, storing it as a data URL in localStorage and providing apply and remove functions.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light/dark themes plus layout and dialog pointer-event overrides.
frontend/src/lib/categories.ts: Maps backend categories to user-facing labels and Tailwind color classes.
frontend/src/lib/distanceFilterDebug.ts: Provides optional console debug logging for distance-based filtering and exposes helpers on window.
frontend/src/lib/env.ts: Typed helpers for reading Vite environment variables with optional fallback.
frontend/src/lib/leafletLoader.ts: Manages dynamic loading and reference-counted reuse of Leaflet and MarkerCluster scripts and styles.
frontend/src/lib/localUpdates.ts: Category label/color utilities plus distance-based relevance checks for local updates.
frontend/src/lib/locationFilter.ts: Checks whether a story is within a given radius and logs debug info if enabled.
Defines UI text variants for different location-permission states.
frontend/src/lib/reverseGeocode.ts: Reverse‑geocodes coordinates via Nominatim with caching and graceful fallbacks.
frontend/src/lib/startupValidation.ts: Validates key environment config at startup and logs warnings without blocking.
frontend/src/lib/storySorting.ts: Provides functions to sort stories by various criteria and convert frontend sort options to backend format.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility helpers for class merging, distance calculation, and formatting location or distance strings.
frontend/src/lib/wallpaperValidation.ts: Validates wallpaper file size and type and exposes helpers for size/type labels.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity before rendering the main App.
frontend/src/pages/AdminModerationPage.t: Admin dashboard for viewing, dismissing, and deleting reported stories with story detail viewing support.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main feed and map view page handling story discovery, location-based filtering, intro logic, and story creation dialog.
frontend/src/pages/LocalUpdatesPage.tsx: Displays local updates in list or map view, manages location tracking, notifications, muting, and update creation/settings.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: User profile page listing posted, liked, and pinned stories with loading, error states, and story detail handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers to read URL parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and optionally clear them from hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, and containers with plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking features, requests, and versions for the Local Updates Back button work.
